name: DataBurst
description:
Break through the mainframe in DataBurst. Use your scanning device to spot the system's firewalls before breaching in and acquire all the data.

Use your virus abilities efficiently and aim for the high score!

Controls :

It's highly recommended to play with an Xbox Gamepad.

Use the left joystick to spot the obstacles before the light goes on.

Once the lights are on,  use the Joystick + A to dash through the level and collect all the data cubes while the firewall became invisible.

Made By Team Cherche Stage for WonderJam 2020

The theme is "Frenzy!", and the sub-themes are "Arcade," and "Exploration".
